title: TicketmasterÔºçBuy, Sell Tickets to Concerts, Sports
description:
Ticketmaster gives you access to millions of live event tickets and makes it easy to buy, sell, transfer, and get in - so you can get on with making memories that last.

We are the Official Ticketing Partner of the NFL, NBA, NHL, and USTA. Add in our exclusive partnerships with thousands of venues, artists, bands, theater tours, and broadway shows and shopping with Ticketmaster gives you unparalleled access to the most memorable live events worldwide.
 
Ticket management at your fingertips. You‚Äôre always just a few clicks away from securing the perfect seats to the live events and shows you love.
 
BUY SIMPLY
- Search millions of events and get real-time updates as new listings go live.
- Use interactive 3-D venue maps and see your seat view before you buy.

CHANGE OF PLANS?
- List your tickets on our trusted resale marketplace and sell to other fans.
- Transfer your seats to friends and family for free.
 
PROTECT YOURSELF FROM SCALPERS
- Avoid forgeries ‚Äúsimilar location‚Äù seats with Verified Tickets. The seats you buy the seats you‚Äôll sit in and backed by our 100% guarantee.

YOUR PHONE IS YOUR TICKET
- Scan into your events with the app or upload your seats to Apple Wallet (mobile-entry events only).
- See all your event info in one convenient place.
 
NEVER MISS OUT ON AN EVENT
- Get alerts about your favorite events, artists, bands, and venues.

Download the Ticketmaster app and go live.

REACH OUT TO US
Website: www.ticketmaster.com
Twitter: www.twitter.com/ticketmaster
Instagram: www.instagram.com/ticketmaster
Facebook: www.facebook.com/ticketmaster

summary: Buy and sell concert, broadway, theater, sports, NFL, MLB & last minute tickets.
recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ Get through the purchase flow faster by scanning a credit card. Save time and remove the friction of manual credit card entry by scanning a credit card to purchase tickets to your favorite event.
‚Ä¢ A new onboarding experience for a seamless introduction into the app!
‚Ä¢ Every update of our app includes reliability and performance improvements
comments: Everytime I check events, favorites, notifications, and account the application completely crashes. This is heavily disappointing, because if I were to attend an event and the app crashes I won't be able to go inside the venue. What would be the purpose of having the app then? The application is meant to be accessible to users (who chose to use their phone as their ticket access), but it's pointless if the ticket is inaccessible to us online through the application.

The worst app ever. It logged me out and won't let me back in. I spent way to much money to not be able to see my ticket. I've had the ticket for a month and it decides to do this. Why are you not fixing it. People need their tickets that they paid you way to much money for. It's very nerve wracking not to know if the app will be working in time for my concert. Very poor customer service.

Up until the last update, this app worked okay. Now this last update has caused the app to freeze and shut down every time I try to access an option on the left side bar. Email support is not available to help, rendering this app virtually useless to see the status on postponed/canceled events that I have paid for.

Although I love the Ticketmaster App due to the ease of it, I am disappointed in the fact that we are not getting event updates through the app. I need to know if events are cancelled or rescheduled! I have numerous events that I have purchased tickets for months in advance and we are now coming up on those events without any notice! Your customers need to know and the app would be the best way to disseminate that information! Please add that into the app! We need to know!

Just bought tickets for a concert in a month. I havent been able to log into the app for weeks! Just shows a blank white screen. There is no way I am able to view my QR codes without the app unless I get them mailed to be for an extra fee- which is NOT happening. I have already emailed the customer service and they havent gotten back to me. Please fix the login issue. Time is ticking! (will fix the 1-star review when resoved)

title: SeatGeek ‚Äì Tickets to Sports, Concerts, Broadway
description:
SeatGeek is the smart way to buy and resell tickets to thousands of sporting events (NFL, NBA, NHL, MLB, MLS), concerts, festivals, and Broadway/theater shows. Tickets are backed by SeatGeek's 100% buyer guarantee, and resellers may list tickets above or below face value.

FEATURES
‚óÜ Interactive Seating Charts
Explore the best deals mapped on interactive seating charts with panoramic photographs from every section. Know what the view from your seat looks like before you buy tickets. 

‚óÜ Deal Score
Never worry about getting ripped off again, every deal on SeatGeek is color-coded from best to worst based on value. 

‚óÜ Mobile Tickets
Show your e-ticket in the SeatGeek app to gain access to venues, no printer necessary. 

‚óÜ Send Tickets
No more waiting outside the stadium for friends in the rain. Send extra tickets to your friends‚Äô phones in a tap for free or for $$$ (US only).

‚óÜ Sell Your Tickets
Can‚Äôt attend tomorrow night‚Äôs concert? Sell your tickets on SeatGeek‚Äôs Marketplace in one tap. SeatGeek will even recommend the best price to help you quickly sell your tickets. 

‚óÜ Discover Nearby Events
Easily browse tickets for any live event. Search by team, artist, venue, genre, or sport (baseball, basketball, hockey, football, Nascar, etc.) to see upcoming events near you. 

‚óÜ Buy Your Way
Conveniently pay via Google Pay or Credit Card.

‚óÜ The Daily Tap
Enter up to once a day to win free tickets to live events nearby.

summary: Buy and sell tickets to sports, concerts, theater, festivals, and comedy events
recentChanges: Meet our latest feature, The Daily Tap ‚Äî We're giving away tickets to the hottest events. For free. And every day you tap is another chance to win. Navigate to the Browse tab to enter! You'll also find our completely redesigned in-app experience created to enhance the final hours leading up to your game, concert, or show. For better planning, we now provide precise weather updates, venue bag policies, even directions ‚Äî all right here in the app.
comments: Prior to the last 2 regulation Portland Timbers matches I had issues with the Seat Geek app. On the 1st occasion, I couldn't access my tickets at all and had to get physical tickets from Customer Service. That meant I missed the 1st 20 minutes of a match. The next time I couldn't send the tickets at all when I wasn't able attend. Again, why should I have to go to customer service to get this fixed? Please fix the app.

They take a service fee to provide ONE service - legit tickets. Imagine getting all excited for a show with your friends, and then getting there and being told your ticket had 'already been scanned' and you cannot enter. On top of that it's taken over a week to get a refund. DO NOT USE. --- I got my refund but +20% didn't even cover the cost of getting to the event not to mention the exteme disappointment of finding out you weren't going to get to see the show.

Why do you need to send an email to verify the payout method and why is this information no where on the app or mobile site? I had to login to the full site on a computer to figure out what the issue was for selling tickets. There should be functionality in the app to upload your government ID or AT LEAST an error message with the appropriate information. You can't even view how much you spent on tickets without using the full site.
Used this app to purchase tix for concerts and sporting events for about 2 years now. Hasn't crashed once, never had any issues with my purchases, very easy to use.
So far it seems like a wonderful app ! And I have seen this company help many people. Not only by providing tickets, but also by being generous with money to people who need/deserve it !

title: Gametime - Tickets to Sports, Concerts, Theater
description:
Gametime is the app that helps *you* score last minute ticket deals to all your favorite events!  

Did you know ticket prices for your favorite events - sports, music, and theater - actually go down the closer you get to showtime?  Get the best deals, see the view from your seats, and utilize Gametime‚Äôs super-simple checkout process to get into events even after they have started. Mobile ticket delivery helps save paper and printing headaches. Easy mobile ticket sharing lets you send tickets to all your friends so they can join you in the fun.

SCORE GREAT DEALS
- Take advantage of falling ticket prices as you get closer to the event time. 
- Buy tickets up to 90-minutes after the start of the event.

EASY TICKET BUYING
- The best seats at the lowest prices = big savings!
- Utilize venue maps to make easy seat and price comparisons to find the exact seat you want.  
- Panoramic photos show the exact view from any section. 
- 2-Click checkout process.
- Mobile delivery allows you to buy and walk into the event without missing a step.  

NO HIDDEN FEES
- None of the added ‚Äúprinting fees‚Äù or ‚Äúconvenience fees‚Äù that other companies love to add onto their prices at checkout.  
- Pick your seats, see the full cost, and click to buy.  
- No add-on costs.  Ever.  

ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY
- Mobile ticket delivery saves paper & ink. 
- Send tickets to friends directly to their mobile phones, they don‚Äôt need to print anything either!

EASILY SELL TICKETS  
- List and price tickets with just a few taps. 
- If you have paper tickets (boo!) simply take a picture to have them listed to sell digitally.  
- Get text updates as soon as your tickets sell.
- Get paid through PayPal or in Gametime credit.

Gametime is THE ticket app for all major sporting events including top baseball, football, hockey, and basketball from all the top leagues (MLB, NFL, NBA, NHL, MLS, & NCAA).  Discover the top concerts from hit artists (Taylor Swift, Billie Eillish, Drake, Post Malone, Bruno Mars, Jonas Brothers, Mumford & Sons, Blink-182, and more!). Don‚Äôt miss out on top theater shows (Hamilton, The Book of Mormon, Les Misrables).  Also other events like Monster Jam, WWE, and hit comedy tours (such as Nick Offerman, Aziz Ansari, and Trevor Noah).  

We believe in shared experiences (bring your friends!) and the power and enjoyment of live entertainment.    

Shop, compare, and save with Gametime.

developerAddress: 799 Market St, San Francisco, CA 94103
recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: Able to get tickets last minute. Dev's have some issues to workout, however you will receive your tickets. I suggest having your tickets loaded before you get to the venue. I am a contractor for the three largest wireless carriers in the USA, towers near sporting and concert venues the day of an event are always overloaded. Do yourself a favor and load before you get to the venue, a screenshot will also work. Cheers!

The experience in buying tickets is very easy but over time the fee amount above the actual ticket price has raised significantly since first coming out and they do not indicate what it is for. It'll give you a price for each individual ticket and then once selected have a total for you to buy much above the ticket price and no where does it explain what the extra money is for before you pay for them. Also for concerts, if arena name is too long it doesn't show the city it is in within the space

Game time is the ticket app I use for my Orioles tickets, the prices are lower by far over every other app I've used and the interface is very attractive. The veiw of my seat is probably my favorite feature. It's very extensive so I can do all of my event searching in just one place. Thank you gametime and keep up the good work!

Took a long time and several attempts trying numerous log ins to finally get into the Game time ap. Made very nervous of my recent purchase and took time away from the many other things I was to do instead of fight with this. I just hope I get my tickets and will be able to get into game??? When I can view them I think I'm going to print them out if I can just to be on the safe side. Very inconvenient.

My favorite app to use for spring training games in Arizona. Fees are relatively high compared to other sites, however prices are almost always lower than StubHub, SeatGeek or others. Usually a lower all in price to purchase tickets. Selling tickets is also much easier because the app automatically sets the price to be competitive in the market. I have had very good success selling tickets. GREAT APP for last minute ticket transactions

title: TickPick - No Fee Tickets
description:
The fastest, cheapest and easiest app to purchase tickets to all of your favorite events (sports, concerts & theater). With No Service Fees and a unique Score Report (to help you find the best deals) buying great tickets at great prices has never been this easy.

100% guaranteed ticket marketplace. Resellers may list tickets above or below face value.

--FEATURES‚Äî

1. Discovery ‚Äì Find last minute events and deals in your area ‚Äì or search any team, artist, event or venue to see schedules and available tickets.
2. Sorting - Overwhelmed by too many ticket options? Filter by price, quantity, and Seat Rating (determine by seat location, available only on TickPick).
3. Deals - Tickets are ranked by our patented Score Report (determined by price and seat location), which helps you get the best bang for your buck!
4. High Rollers - Use our proprietary 'Seat Rating' to sort tickets from the best seats in the house to the worst.
5. Seat Views - For all major sports see pictures of your seats before you buy tickets.
6. Track Events ‚Äì Not ready to buy? Keep track of key event stats so you can make the best buying decision when you're ready.
7. Payment - At checkout, just scan your credit card and turn your device into your ticket.

recentChanges: Some under the hood updates to make sure your no fee ticket experience is as smooth as possible.
comments: Game I purchased tickets to has been canceled. Trying to get a hold of someone regarding either a refund or a voucher. Instead, their help line causes the app to crash. It's been this way for days now. Regretting my decision to use this app.

Way to step up!!! I purchased a few hundred dollars worth of Spring training tickets through this app. TickPick was the first to refund my tickets! I also purchased tickets directly from MLB, as of today I'm still waiting for refund instructions...
If you have questions clicking the "Need Help" button immediately crashes the app. So if say your event was cancelled and you want to know how to proceed - you're out of luck.
Cannot find contact information to get assistance. Everytime I click get help the app crashes, deleted and reinstalled app still doesn't work. Went to actual website and cannot find contact info
Even though the service charge is technically built into the price on TickPick, it still comes out at least 15% less than if you buy from Ticketmaster or other services that charge service fees.

comments: Horrible! Customer service is horrendous. My first purchase of tickets: I was on the phone with their representative for the first 45 min of a concert because the virtual tickets were unable to scan. Before they finally sent me new tickets that were not corrupt. The second purchase: The date of my concert was postponed, and when I asked to exchange or refund my tickets they told me that was not possible, AND it is not possible for me to resell my tickets on their website or app.

Horrible! A giant pain to access tickets. High fees. On top of that, I can't download my ticket from the app. If the app is down, I'm screwed. Just want my f###ing tickets emailed or downloaded. Too much to ask after I paid a 30% fee for the service? Aparently so. Never again.

More verification steps than my bank and more sketchy-looking than a pirate NFL stream, but it's the only way I could get tickets ahead of the game. And why the hell can't I print my damn tickets? Oh yeah, cause they want to be on my phone. Uninstalling the minute I'm through the gate but they already got my data. All I can do is leave this review and go back to scalpers next time.

I was looking for tickets to a concert. When I started to fill out the info for the tickets when it came to the part for payment I put in the info of credit card and right away I get a notification from my back that there were 4 charges from vivid seats and I never hit ( place order ) button. Now I'm charged for tickets I never purchased

Only use this app of you're desperate, because the service fees are f'n ridiculously high! 2 tickets cost me an extra $103.44! I then paid $24.00 for event insurance, but that is on me. The price shown should include taxes and fees. Other wise your getting blindsided with extra cost!

summary: Buy tickets for any concert, like Elton John's farewell tour, at the best price!
recentChanges: We hope you‚Äôre enjoying the StubHub app! In this update, we‚Äôve fixed a few things to make the app faster and easier to use.
comments: Bad experience leads to a poor rating and negative comments. I purchased tickets to a off Broadway play in NY a week prior. The tickets weren't available for download 'til a before the play. With StubHub's guarantee I trusted that I would be good to and I could go ahead and plan the rest of my trip. Did I forget to mention that my wife and I flew in from TX. After a flight, checking into our hotel, and around 10 pm the day before the play, we still had no tickets. Horrible experience for sure.

The app works fine, I even sold tickets that I purchased by accident to someone else through stubhub, I am not going to be buying anymore tickets though because the fees are ridiculous. I paid double because of my mistake but the fees are just not worth it... so expect the fees when purchasing tickets.... I've been using them for years but in finally fed up with paying so much...

I found it difficult to find my tickets. I didn't know where to find them. Was not aware that the tickets were sent to Ticketmaster. It was very confusing..finally found them and needed the help of MSG to get them on my phone. I feel there should be better instruction when you make the purchase.

Its important to make sure the email address is correct before you buy tickets, i screwed up and my tickets went to a deactivated acct.but StubHub made it right and we made it to the show...it was fantastic
Great service! Tickets always delivered in time for game! Information and updates sent in timely fashion. StubHub is the best for tickets

title: TodayTix ‚Äì Theater Tickets
description:
Getting tickets to the best performances in your city has never been easier than with TodayTix, the highest-rated ticketing app in the Play Store. Created by Broadway producers, TodayTix provides insightful guidance into the world of culture, allowing users to discover new shows and unlock access to the best seats at the best prices.

First launched for tickets to New York's Broadway and Off-Broadway shows, TodayTix is now available in London's West End, Chicago, Los Angeles, the San Francisco Bay Area, Boston, Washington D.C., Seattle, Philadelphia, Toronto, Connecticut, Houston, Dallas, and Melbourne.

----FEATURES----

TodayTix simplifies and streamlines the previously difficult theater ticket buying experience. 
Here's how:

- Take the guesswork out of buying theater tickets. We always list the best prices up to 30 days in advance. 
- Enter daily lotteries to popular Broadway and Off-Broadway shows. Win free tickets, access to exclusive deals, and more!¬†
- Unlock day-of Rush tickets at deep discounts on a first-come, first-served basis every performance day.
- Skip the lines. Book tickets in just 30 seconds or less, and never wait in long lines again.
- Sign up for alerts. Find out when tickets to your favorite sold out show becomes available.¬†Get reminders the next time Rush and Lottery deals are live.
- Get the VIP treatment. Our customers rave about our friendly and personable service.
- Buy with confidence. Unlike many other apps, we work directly with the theatre‚Äôs box office, never with ticket brokers. 

----THE BUZZ----

‚ÄúAn app that solves the biggest annoyance with buying theater tickets.‚Äù - Business Insider UK

‚ÄúThe Uber of Broadway tickets.‚Äù - Forbes 

‚ÄúSave money, save time, and feel like a VIP while you‚Äôre doing it.‚Äù ‚Äì Entertainment Weekly

‚ÄúTodayTix is for travelers who don‚Äôt feel like killing prime New York City touring time by waiting in line at TKTS, or for those who prefer to plan a few days ahead of time rather than risking their plans to the vagaries of same-day availability.‚Äù- Frommer‚Äôs¬†

----CONNECT WITH US----

Facebook:¬†www.facebook.com/todaytix
Twitter:¬†www.twitter.com/todaytix
Instagram:¬†www.instagram.com/todaytix
Website:¬†www.todaytix.com

recentChanges: We want to discover a whole new world of theater with you. Check out the new Discover tab in New York and London today!
comments: I heard about this app because of the Friday Forty lottery to win cheap tickets to Harry Potter and the Cursed Child. I won that lottery after a couple months of entering and the process was so easy and smooth. I loved the seats I was given and it was a great experience. I have since found that they also sell tickets to heaps of other theatre productions and ballets that I'm interested in and they always have great rush deals which I love. Definitely recommend this app to theatre lovers!
Was an easy app to use. Everything went really smoothly. Tickets were ready at the box office. Great seats and great last minute price. Highly recommend.

Great app. Pretty easy to use. Gives you quick look up and convenient bookmark options - I love the rush lotteries! It allows you an ample countdown option so you are able to make the time. I wish it had more detailed info on the show for preview or a link to expand for more. For purchases> GOOD prices, just wish your fee charges were a bit lower per ticket.. A Seat number and or highlighted seat area would be much more helpful. Unfortunately dont know exactly where your seats would be.

I use TDF for the best discounts but if a show I really want to see is not on the site, TodayTix is always my back up plan and almost always comes through. Seat locations are generally good, sometimes excellent. Prices help keep theater going affordable for me. App is very easy to use and always has a wide selection of offerings. Purchase process is simple and forgiving if you need to go back and change or adjust something. The email notifications are also helpful reminders and provide all the necessary details.

Really like this app. and I use it a lot. They have more shows and time choices than other sites as well as offering same day rush ticket options on some plays. Their only down side is that their prices are higher that some other websites, but they are still lower than most box offices and the big commercial ticket seller websites.

title: Goldstar - Buy Tickets

comments: I love this app. There are lots of entertainment options at really great prices.

Goldstar is a great resource for me because I've been able to have more entertainment in my life. The ticket prices for the events are less expensive and using the app to purchase tickets is seamless. I enjoy your app very much.
Great entertainment. Affordable prices. It's the best!
Goldstar has given me affordable access to some wonderful arts experiences-- as a senior on a fixed income, this is a much appreciated benefit. I wish more events were linked to Goldstar!
Great discounts//great shows.and seating..i do recommend this app a plus..thank U

title: AXS Tickets
description:
Tap for tickets to see the artists and teams you love. With the AXS app, you can find great events near you, buy 100% official tickets, sell your seats if you can‚Äôt go, and more. It‚Äôs all a fan needs, all in one app.
 
BUY THE PERFECT TICKETS
Front row or on the aisle? Pick your exact seats on interactive maps, get more ticket options with AXS Official Resale, and go in style with AXS Premium or VIP offers.
 
EASILY SELL YOUR TICKETS
Plans can change. If you have seats from AXS but can‚Äôt make it, quickly list the tickets for sale from your account and reach tons of potential buyers.
 
USE TICKETS WITH THE APP
No paper required. Just pull up your tickets in the AXS app, get them scanned at the gate, and head into your event.
 
TRANSFER TO FRIENDS
It‚Äôs super easy. Stop hand-delivering tickets or waiting at the entrance for everyone to arrive ‚Äì quickly transfer tickets to friends and meet them at your seats.  
 
DISCOVER GREAT EVENTS
There‚Äôs so much to see. Find out when your faves are coming to town, check out what‚Äôs happening soon, and browse events by your interests ‚Äì from basketball and rock to comedy and theater.

recentChanges: Thank you for choosing AXS! We are constantly improving our app so please make sure you have Updates turned on. This update includes bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: This is utter garbage. I'd rate it zero stars if possible. I don't want to be forced to install an app to display a QR code to enter an event. This experience makes me want to avoid shows ticketed by AXS in the future. I guess its easy to be just a bit less evil than Ticketmaster but that doesn't make you good. ***Update*** Axs replied with some milquetoast trash about how they're providing a great experience when in fact any part of the experience they're providing is the opposite of what I want out of a ticketing app (i.e. for it to NOT EXIST AT ALL). I went ahead and reported this app for violations to GDPR since it doesn't have a way to delete your information.

I don't care how "unique" this app might be. I prefer to print PDF tickets & resent being forced to install an app I don't want, and that must reside in internal memory, on my Smartphone. God help you, if you have a bad data connection or any type of phone failure at the venue. Also, a $20 service fee for a digital ticket is highway robbery. Whenever I can, I prefer to buy tickets directly from the box office. In this case, unfortunately, I must use AXS, a company I avoid whenever possible. üëéüëé

I need my tickets for an event tonight and ordered them months ago, I've been trying to download this app for two days and it will not download, whether or not the download issue is your fault or Google plays doesn't matter, the fact that I have been trying for this long and there is no backup way to access my tickets even through my email is complete bs

Garbage. Requiring an app to get your tickets is slimy. Of course this junk immediately requests location permissions. Ugh. No. Also it overrides your brightness setting. Screw this app. Shady company, piece of junk app. All they want is to harvest your data and sell it while charging you a fee for the convenience of it. Scumbags.

Update to 2 stars: I just wanted 45 minutes with customer service trying to get tickets transferred! Terrible app terrible customer service. I've never had so much difficulty than trying to use tickets through the axs app. I would much rather get email tickets that I can just show the venue on my phone. I will be installing this app just for ticketing and deleting it when I am done. It is nonsense to continually have to have an app on my phone just for concert tickets.

title: NYC Parking Ticket Pay or Dispute
description:
‚ÄúNYC Parking Ticket Pay or Dispute‚Äù is New York City‚Äôs official mobile app to securely pay or dispute parking and camera violations. You will be able to do the following:
¬∑ Pay tickets by credit or debit card or through your bank account (eCheck). No Fee applies when paid using eCheck.
¬∑ Dispute a ticket immediately using your device‚Äôs camera to upload evidence.
¬∑ Search ticket(s) using violation or license plate numbers.
¬∑ Save tickets you have previously searched for.
¬∑ Save license plates and billing information on your device.
¬∑ View payment history by ticket or license plate numbers.
¬∑ View dispute history by ticket or license plate numbers.
¬∑ Receive receipts by email and/or text.

recentChanges: Minor Bug fixes
comments: Only works if you have your ticket #. I rented a car and every time I put in the plate it wouldn't even load an error. Instead it just would never process. Even when I went online in a computer an error would come up and the box would disappear never even letting me read the first word. I finally got a screenshot and was able to read it and it refused to give me my ticket because it was for a rental. I had to contact the cops to find the ticket. I couldn't pay the ticket until I had the number!

1) the app can be more intuitive 2) despite presenting evidence you are most likely going to find yourself paying the ticket you were given. Seems like the traffic police are seen more as a collection service to the city instead of an agency that helps relieve traffic congestion. That said paying via an app is easier than mailing it in or going to court.

I am uninstalling the Park NYC app. The second time I am receiving a ticket while my session on the Park NYC app is active. If you want added work then parking using the official Park NYC app works. You will get a ticket but install Pay or Dispute and waste time and energy explaining why you bothered with either of these apps to begin with.

Could not see payment window after scanning bar code. There was no option for "Done" or "Continue". Turns out the payment window was hidden underneath. They make it easy to ticket you, but do not make it easy to pay. Makes me want to go back to NYC real soon! That's okay. Thay have plenty of other tourists. They don't need my business!

Awesome experience so far, this app definitely is useful and saves you a ton of time with fighting parking tickets. If you have your receipt clearly displayed just take multiple pictures of your dashboard, the ticket itself along with the zone number, if a machine is down also take a picture and easily submit it. Very easy app to use and very convenient.

title: Flash Seats
description:
Flash Seats¬Æ Mobile App: The Future of Ticketing Today‚Ñ¢
The Flash Seats¬Æ Mobile App makes it easier for you to discover, buy, sell and transfer your tickets on-the-go. You can even enter your events with a Mobile ID through the app on your phone! Simplify your ticket experience with Flash Seats¬Æ mobile!   

- Enter events with convenience: 
The ONLY mobile ticketing application that lets you enter events and buy, sell, or transfer tickets, all from your phone. The Flash Seats Mobile App provides you with a secure, unique, 2D barcode that is scanned to get you into events. No tickets to bring, no ID to remember‚Äîjust show your phone and you‚Äôre in!

Find your favorite artists or team nearby or in another location. Browse the listings that meet your needs, find the seats you want, pay for them, and you‚Äôre all set! Tickets you buy from Flash Seats are guaranteed and are instantly added to your account.

recentChanges: This update includes bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: 1st time user, had a abysmal experience. Now scared I'll have issues the day of my event. Tickets shouldn't be this hard. I opened the app for the first time and got an error about connectivity. After switching to data I got past it. I attempt to register, but apparently I already have an account. I try to reset the password and I get an error. Instead, I request a reset on the site. After I login I am told my account is disabled and to contact support. Currently over 1 week of no response.

Terrible. A joke. Used the emails to try to set up an account and accept a StubHub tranfer. All failed and then couldn't be reset. Finally used a bogus email and it worked then created the email afterward. Took an hour on the phone with a StubHub rep. Wth?!!!!

Bought tickets, tried to sign in to view them and it says my email is already being used..ok..so I try and reset, says it sent to my email, never received. Sent 6 messages to customer service for help, still no reply. What's going on here??

I can't log in for some reason as my account is apparently locked. It says to contact support, but gives me no information on how to do it. The app seems very leaving compared to most other ticket apps.
Hate that the arena in Cleveland uses this junk. App doesn't work, just says that it has "Connectivity issues" and closes over and over. Tells me to try again when I'm connected, but I am connected.

title: Ticket Club - No Fee Tickets to Events
description:
Ticket Club is where people in the know buy tickets.

Other ticket retailers sneak surprise fees into every purchase, which quickly pile up and cost you more. With Ticket Club, you‚Äôll save every time. Get a premier membership and you won‚Äôt pay a dime in service fees. Ever.  

---- WIDE SELECTION ----
Ticket Club sources its tickets from one of the world's largest and most reliable exchanges. You‚Äôll get the same great seats you would elsewhere, for much less. 

---- 100% GUARANTEE ----
Once your order is accepted, we guarantee your tickets will be valid and shipped in time for the event.

---- WHY IT WORKS ----
Ticket Club offers the same great tickets to the events you love at competitive prices. With a Premier membership, the price you see is the price you pay. Join our club and you‚Äôll skip their fees. It‚Äôs that simple.

---- CUSTOMER REVIEWS ----

My family and I had a great night at the Atlanta Braves game! The tickets we purchased were very reasonable and the ballpark experience was incredible. Even got to witness a walk off Home run!

Cheapest price for the same tickets by far. I checked StubHub, Vivid and Ticketmaster resale site and these were the cheapest.

I went to Stubhub like normal and was fixing to pay $80+ in service fees. I looked around and got the same exact tickets without the service fees!¬†

They have an amazing selection of tickets, especially well-priced re-sale tix for broadway shows.

Ordered tickets to the MLB game (Nationals vs Marlins) online while in Washington, DC. No additional fees were charged on top of the listed price!

I had no problems receiving my etickets and I saved about $20 per ticket compared to other sites like seatgeek or vivid seats.

comments: Best of the ticket sites as total price is lower since no hidden fees. I wish they had Value score filters and price alert notifications Disappointed that ticketclub cuts off sale one hour prior to showtime. I had to purchase last event from StubHub which apparently does not have such a cutoff.
Simple, easy to use, and great prices. Was able to grab last minutes tickets with no issues, and saved over the entry gate price.
Great price for when concerts are sold out at Ticketmaster. Where other ticket resale apps rip u off for being desperate. The catch is you need to buy their membership or get it free from referral.
great app, happy with my purchase. thanks ticketclub
Good priced tickets. Love skipping the fees!

summary: Your ticket to more. Buy movie tickets, invite friends and pre-order snacks!
recentChanges:
We're here to make your movie experience as easy as possible, so we've launched Amazon Pay in the app! Connect with Amazon once and you'll never have to enter your credit card again.
We've also added a new seatmap feature that lets you toggle between showtimes to find the best seats. It's super handy if you're looking at busy showtimes because no one puts Baby in the front row.
Lastly, now you can add a movie to your WatchList while you are watching trailers.
See you at the movies!
comments: The Atom Tickets app is fantastic to use. It let's me choose my showtime for my movie that I'm seeing. And, it sends me a text message of my ticket to show at the theater. No more purchasing ticket(s) at the box office. I highly recommend the Atom Tickets app. Two thumbs up.
I used to love this app. Lately several transactions have failed. I am not using it anymore because of the inconvenience it is causing. Purchasing the tickets doesn't guarantee you get them.

Unable to see my seat selection. Unable to select or purchase new seats. This is for Flix Brewhouse in Albuquerque, NM. And is for the princess mononoke showing on Monday, 03/16/2020 at 7pm. The problem exists in the app, and on the atom website.
worx phenomenally well! I love the convenience choosing My seats, whatever theater I want just showing my phone when I get there! Seriously works great and it's never glitchy!
Well honestly it's pretty good and the theaters are good as well. The only downside is that they don't have a rewards program like certain other theater companies

title: Transit GO Ticket
description: The Transit Go Ticket App allows riders to buy bus, rail and water taxi tickets using their mobile device. No more worries about carrying cash for transit fare, Transit Go Ticket is good on King County Metro Buses, Sound Transit Light Rail and Sounder, King County Water Taxi, Seattle Streetcar, Seattle Monorail and Kitsap Transit routed buses.
descriptionHTML: The Transit Go Ticket App allows riders to buy bus, rail and water taxi tickets using their mobile device. No more worries about carrying cash for transit fare, Transit Go Ticket is good on King County Metro Buses, Sound Transit Light Rail and Sounder, King County Water Taxi, Seattle Streetcar, Seattle Monorail and Kitsap Transit routed buses.
summary: Buy and use bus, rail, water taxi and streetcar mobile tickets.
recentChanges: Native sign in, improved navigation, and Spanish support.
comments: I have multiple metro tickets showing as available, I bought all at once thinking it would be easier to use but now when I click to use one it asks me to download something and says tickets are unavailable (eventhough they have not been activated). I have to buy an additional ticket every time now. Please fix this. Otherwise it's a great option to have.

You need to update and fix this app. Last week the colors weren't changing to the appropriate transfer, and just now the store keeps giving me an error message whenever i try to buy a ticket. I have zero cash or back up and i am depending on this to get me to work. So fix it if this is supposed to replace cash. Otherwise you will continue to screw over the people who depend on it

This app, now 3 years old, is awful. Errors out to the tickets page frequently, often takes MINUTES to load and display my ticket, even when it was previously activated. Sometimes has a big where it shows the wrong transfer color for the day. When a ticket expires, it displays a dialog box "error" although that is clearly not an error. Terrible responsiveness when you contact customer service through the app. This app shpuld be trashed and something new created. After three years, will uninstall

First, I'm really thankful Metro makes this option available - I commute exclusively by bus/bike and it's so handy to have this if I can't find my pass. Unfortunately I can't seem to get a ticket ready in time to present it to the driver as I'm boarding, because it keeps telling me I need to "redownload" my tickets to use them even tho I am connected to data. Shutting off WiFi and closing/re-opening the app seems to resolve it after a few tries, but by then then it's too late.

Works good for buses for me. You can prebuy many bus tickets; they save on your phone and don't expire. But not lightrail, those are 1 week max. Also lightrail doesn't take certain cards. Payment option just doesn't show up. Possibly confusing. Probably bad if you lose phone service before activating ticket, which can happen underground. When you first open app in the morning it wants to redownload tickets for some reason. Doesn't seem to react until app is again opened.

title: Fandango Movie Tickets & Times
description:
Download Fandango - the #1 movie ticketing app. Catch the newest trailers, browse Rotten Tomatoes¬Æ scores, find the latest showtimes and guarantee tickets to the right movie at the right time with ticketing to more than 30,000 screens nationwide. Plus, sign up for our Fandango VIP+ loyalty program to buy movies and get movies.

GUARANTEE TICKETS & SKIP THE BOX OFFICE LINE: Get your tickets ahead of time to secure the best seats to the year‚Äôs biggest movies with reserved seating. Save time and skip the box office line when you scan your Mobile Ticket using your Android.

EARLY ACCESS SCREENINGS: Be the first to see the year‚Äôs biggest movies like Rocketman, The Secret Life of Pets 2 and more exclusively through Fandango Early Access! 

BROWSE MOVIES + THEATERS: Check out the latest trailers for new & upcoming movies, browse Rotten Tomatoes¬Æ scores, and be the first to know when showtimes are available with FanAlert‚Ñ¢. summary: Get showtimes, guarantee tickets, browse Rotten Tomatoes¬Æ scores and trailers.
contentRatingDescription: Violence, Blood, Suggestive Themes, Simulated Gambling
recentChanges: * We've squashed the bugs and made moviegoing faster and easier than ever.
comments: Very easy to use, I saw two movies during December. Love the app.

Convenient and super nice that it has everything all in the app. One stop shop. The service fee is annoying but I don't see anything outside of matinee times really and I'm a crown club member so it all works out. You can watch trailers for all movies and no need to look up individual theatres.

Easy to use, a few fixes could make it great. Overall the app is really good. Lots of theater options, trailers and I like the QR codes for tickets. My only complaint is, depending on how you select the theater, sometimes the movie showtime buttons don't show up fully on the screen. Probably an aspect ratio issue, as you can see part of the buttons but can't read the times. Also, I wish the qty selection wouldn't take you to another screen. Just put +/- buttons to select qty of tickets.

Needed to change the movie time after already purchasing my tickets. Was able to do so with the app in just a few seconds, no hassle or extra fee. Great deal considering I just spent 20mins on the phone with the movie theater trying to resolve this same issue (with no real help btw) before realizing it could be done with the app smh. Get/explore/use the app!

I absolutely hate the full-screen popup ads every time I open the app and occasionally while I am searching through movies or theaters. I am here because I am buying movie tickets! You already have my business! You do not need to advertise to me! I have lost count of how many times I have actually clicked on an ad that popped up right when I was about to tap on something else, and it's a terrible user experience all around.

title: Airline Ticket Booking app
description:
Do you want to find cheap flights and the best flight deals?

We help with real-time flight status tracking. We compare all popular travel sites in one simple search and help you find the best flights. Our specialized and optimized search engines ensure that you always get the best deals and help make your trip more comfortable and convenient.

It's easy and free, fun to use, and you can save time and money when booking your next trip!

Our easy-to-use hotel app is available worldwide and has been translated into over 45 languages.

I have to seek out alot of shows though where I wish they were brought to me by Live Nation instead. I've even missed some shows from venues I frequent(‚ù§) that I definitely would've went to if the info was brought to me. Keep making it better and I'll keep using the Ap!

I had to submit a support ticket less than five minutes after buying my tickets, because the app (and different browsers) won't recognize my account which means I'd be out of luck trying to redeem my tickets at a show. After I attend this show I'm deleting my account. I'd rather miss future concerts than ever use this app again.
Every time I want to use this app I have to uninstall it then reinstall it!! Now it keeps saying check network settings, what do you want me to check??
Keeps making me log in, which is probably why it's also clunky to use.

Bad way to get tickets Livenation doesn't allow printing of tickets. The app says "your phone is your ticket," but Livenation for phone is nothing but a spinner. I have internet and can load any webpage or video, just not my Livenation tickets. Would not use again.

Our transparent marketplace is the best way for real fans to enjoy festival tickets, sold out event tickets or any kind of live event!

Join amongst more than 4,500,000 Happy Users from over 20 different countries!

Ready to sell or buy tickets for a wide variety of music events, festivals like Justin Timberlake, JAY-Z and Beyonce, Eminem, Drake, U2, BTS Awakenings, Mysteryland, Rock Werchter, Sziget Festival, Lowlands and much more.

title: CA Lottery Official App
description:
Welcome to the NEW & IMPROVED official California Lottery app with a new look, more features and improved menu!
Follow your favorite CA Lottery games in the palm of your hand. 
With Check-A-Ticket you can quickly scan any ticket sold by a CA Lottery retailer to see if you are a winner! 
Not a winner? Simply toggle over to 2nd Chance and scan eligible game codes into a 2nd Chance drawing. 
More convenient than ever to get winning numbers, view jackpot amounts or find your nearest retailer, anytime, anywhere. 

App Features: 
‚Ä¢	Check-A-Ticket allows you to see if your ticket is a winner!
‚Ä¢	Auto Sign-In
‚Ä¢	Hot-Spot draw results available every 4 minutes
‚Ä¢	Enter 2nd Chance drawings! (Scratchers, SuperLotto Plus, Fantasy 5)
‚Ä¢	Track your 2nd Chance submissions
‚Ä¢	Winning numbers for Powerball, Mega Millions, SuperLotto Plus, Fantasy 5, Hot Spot and all Daily games
‚Ä¢	Jackpot amounts
‚Ä¢	Interactive retailer locator map
‚Ä¢	Local office locations for prize claims of $600 or more

Other Features:
‚Ä¢	See the number of California winners and amounts paid for each prize level for Powerball, Mega Millions, SuperLotto Plus, Fantasy 5, and all Daily games
‚Ä¢	The app allows you to find Lucky Retailers and Hot Spot play locations near you
‚Ä¢	Current CA Lottery promotions

The Lottery provides supplemental funding for California Public Schools. Please play responsibly. You must 18 or older to play.

Disclaimer:
Although every effort is made to ensure the accuracy of the winning number information in the CA Lottery Mobile App, mistakes can occur. Please be sure to refresh your screen and look for the draw date when viewing winning numbers. In the event of any discrepancies, California state law and California Lottery regulations prevail. Complete game information and prize claiming instructions are available at www.calottery.com and all California Lottery Retailers.

title: Tickets For Less - Sports, Concerts & Theatre
description:
Tickets For Less is a resale marketplace. Prices may be above or below face value.

Tickets For Less is a reliable source for all events and focuses on providing the tickets you want with the service you deserve.  Unlike other brokers, we differentiate ourselves by guaranteeing NO taxes and NO hidden service fees at checkout.  At Tickets For Less, the price you see is the price you pay.  Our loyal customer base appreciates the honest and direct approach instilled through our sales process.  This approach has led to repeat business and customer referrals resulting in Tickets For Less leading the industry in the sale of Kansas City Chiefs tickets, Kansas City Royals tickets, Kansas University basketball tickets, Kansas Speedway tickets, Sporting KC tickets, and all Sprint Center tickets.  In addition to ticket sales, our company offers top dollar for hard-to-get and premium tickets for nationwide concerts and sporting events. 

Tickets For Less 14 Years in Business

Tickets For Less is happy to celebrate our 14 year anniversary with the local community.  Our company is proud to have been serving the area since 2004 and looks forward to many years to come.  Tickets For Less would like to thank our loyal customer base for providing us the opportunity to contribute our services.  An immense amount of hard work and persistence has gone into making the Tickets For Less organization a success but without our customers the last 14 years would not have been made possible. On behalf of the Tickets For Less staff, thank you for trusting us as your ticket broker choice! 


Note:  All tickets are bought and sold at market value and Tickets For Less is not affiliated with any team, box office or venue.

title: TicketFire - Tickets to Sports, Concerts, Theater
description:
TicketFire has no service fees and the lowest checkout prices for event tickets in the industry, as well as a 100% buyer guarantee. TicketFire is the easiest way to buy, sell, transfer, or use any event ticket. To digitize a ticket within the app, simply take a picture of your ticket with the barcode and event information in view. In minutes, you will have a mobile ticket on the app.

-	Buy tickets to events like Ed Sheeran, Bruno Mars, U2 & Beck, Tim McGraw + Faith Hill, Janet Jackson, Hamilton and Aladdin and more
-	Sell your event ticket on Facebook, YouTube, Google, Craigslist, Twitter, LinkedIn, Snapchat, Instagram, and any other social media platform
-	Digitize event tickets to MLB, NFL, NHL, NBA, concerts, sports, broadway shows, theater, comedy nights and music festivals
-	Transfer your mobile ticket via SMS text, iMessage, Messenger, WhatsApp or other channel to a friend 
-	Mobile tickets: Get into events with your iPhone, Android or Apple Watch 
-	Apple Wallet : Add your tickets to Apple Wallet and get into events with your iPhone or Apple Watch
-	PayPal and Venmo: Easily receive payment from ticket sales from PayPal or Venmo
-	Ticket Sales Security: Mastercard, Visa, American Express, Discover all accepted through Stripe payment gateway
-	Email the PDF version of the ticket to yourself through Gmail, Microsoft Outlook, Hotmail, Yahoo, and all other email accounts
-	List your ticket for sale on StubHub, Vivid Seats, SeatGeek, Fanxchange, or other major exchanges
-	Barcode scanning: Easily digitize your event tickets by taking a picture of your tickets with the TicketFire app

You can store your event tickets as mobile tickets on your phone. Never worry about losing your ticket. Never waste money on overnight shipping through FedEx, UPS, or USPS to transfer tickets to a friend again. Mobile tickets remove the hassle of paper tickets so that you can easily enjoy every event experience!

TicketFire's mobile tickets and PDF tickets work with all major ticket scanners including Ticketmaster, AXS, TicketFly, Telecharge, EventBrite, LiveNation, Spectra tickets, and many more!

comments: You have to give all of your information (and permission to read your contacts) before you can see the prices. And then the total prices (including fees) are higher than StubHub and SeatGeek. Poor value and now they have your data. A lot of the reviews seem a little too perfect to be genuine, also. Go with a more ethical app.
The conversion from TM hard to TM mobile enabled a last minute sale and saved me from a loss. No DOE from the converted mobile. Excellent product.
When I'm looking to buy concert tickets, I always check TicketFire because they have the lowest fees on their tickets. I recently saved 10% compared to StubHub and SeatGeek for the same seats.
The last round of updates was pretty sweet - been using the app for about 9 months now. No quicker way to get rid of your hard tickets.
I recommend TicketFire! It is so easy to use. My favorite part is taking pictures of my tickets and putting them on my phone, so cool!

recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: The user interface is just fine. Pretty standard for something like this. Nothing special and nothing bad. HOWEVER!!! As soon as I sign up, I start getting telemarketer calls. I went from having 1 or 2 a week to 10 a day. They will sell your info even if you uncheck the boxes to not share. Those boxes only keep Eventbrite from filling your email with garbage. Keep this in mind when buying from them or making a profile.

Love this app! It's helped me discover so many more events in London - the "free stuff only" is great too! However, they really need to add more filters such as price and distance ranges, see events on a map, sort by what's closest to you etc. as some searches come back with thousands of results! Still highly recommend this app though :)

This app is great for finding events, but one point I would like to address, is that since events occur in cities, there is no need for the grainy location to be provided, such as when searching, adding Amman will provide different results from the location it chose for me, which is Balqa, which they are close to each other. So just giving a broader way of searching could be better and provide better results, as I found some difficulties browsing events.

"Meh." I've been using Eventbrite for over a decade ... The app? User experience is oversimplified, to the point of uselessness. You cannot "follow" a performer or venue, you can't even search for a venue or town, even if THEY ARE LISTED in events. Waste.

I can't log into the app to see my ticket purchase, all it does is send me emails (7 to be exact) to change my password and nothing happens when I do change it. I had to reach out to the promoter of the event just to make sure I can use the email I received to verify my ticket purchase.

title: MBTA mTicket
description:
Buy a ticket anywhere, anytime - in seconds. The Official MBTA mTicket App is like a ticket office in your pocket. Your smartphone is your ticket! 

With the new MBTA mTicket App for Commuter Rail and Ferry, you can securely purchase MBTA Commuter Rail and Ferry Single Ride, Round-Trip, 10 Ride, and Monthly tickets in seconds. Purchasing a ticket is easy: select your trip & ticket type, enter your payment card information and your smartphone is your ticket! 

Never lose your ticket again! Once you purchase your ticket, it will always stick in My Tickets. Need to replace your phone? No problem -- we can easily transfer any purchased ticket. 

Want to check your schedule or service updates? You can check schedules and T-Alerts right from inside the app!

We are making the app better everyday! Let us know what you think at www.mbta.com/mticket

Features:

‚óè	Secure ticket purchasing with your credit or debit card
‚óè	Your smartphone is your ticket
‚óè	Never worry about zones again -- just select your origin and destination to purchase
‚óè	Never lose your ticket -- tickets can be easily transferred if your phone is lost or stolen
‚óè	Check Commuter Rail schedules, maps, and service alerts
‚óè	Brand new offers from JustRide and the MBTA


Please note that support for Android beta versions or experimental features is not guaranteed and customers using Android beta versions or experimental features do so at their own risk.

comments: Works wonderfully and as advertised. Can easily check when the next train is and buy/show my tickets in seconds.
transaction failed. A email from bank reported: Credit card not present during this transaction. Conductor needed to swipe my card on his phone and print a ticket.

EVERY TIME I use the app it never works properly. When I'm either looking to change the direction of the train to the way I want to go or when I want to change the date to the day I'll be traveling ro check the schedule for that day. The app freezes up and won't change to what I need. I usual have to go in and out of the app until it allows me to. It also has problems when you want to go back to the previous page and it won't go back

This app is okay but it has one really annoying "feature" and that is that you cannot add a payment card prior to making a purchase. I ride the commuter rail very infrequently and for whatever reason it lost the card info from the last time I bought a ticket. I'm not good with the on-screen keyboard on my phone and when I went to purchase a ticket just now, it took forever because I had to re-enter my credit card info. It would have been much better if I could have done that beforehand, but that apparently is not possible. Also this is NOT the fault of the app, but the fact that the commuter rail and subway use completely different payment systems is ridiculous. A CharlieCard would be 10x easier to use than this app.
Horrible. Have been using this app and that i could not log in. It takes "4 months to log in!?" In to a new device the one i have been using. Shameful app.

recentChanges: We've made some improvements to the app that'll make it easier to discover recommended concerts. Lots more to come, so please shoot any feedback over to us at @songkick!
comments: I love how it lets me know about upcoming shows! The notifications for things like pre-sales is helpful too. My only complaints are (1) there is a show from last month that has been frozen at the top of the locations menu, (2) it keeps insisting that I'm following an artist that I am not, and (3) if you add an artist, the app will not automatically tell you if there is a show soon. Those are only minor issues that in no way prevent me from using the app and regularly adding more artists.

I love to use this application when I want to go to shows near me, it also opened me up to new bands I never listened to before, but there are a few things that I think should be tweaked, like widening the search to a state instead of a city, making the notifications less often, and possibly even a genre search, so I can find even more bands that I might like, good app, and if you take my advice, I would 100% give 5 star.

I liked this app before the nag notifications were added. The whole point of downloading this app for me (and probably just about everyone else) is to be notified when new concerts are announced; however, now that I'm receiving notifications that my "concert calendar needs some love," it's just annoying. The fact that I cannot select which notifications I want to receive and which I do not is a deal breaker.

Barely functional. Used to give great updates when bands were coming now they added like 80 bands I've never heard of and have no interest in seeing because usually they're in a totally different genre than the one I enjoy. Uninstalling cuz it's a waste of time when I get excited when I see a notification that a band is coming and it's something I've never heard of nor want to see.

Have been using this app for a while and it's brilliant - I find out when the bands I've selected are playing in the areas I've chosen pretty much as soon as they are announced. It's easy to look at them in a calendar view to track the year ahead. And it's easy to then just click through and purchase tickets. A must have have for any avid concert-goer.

title: Q Ticketing
description:
METRO is the Metropolitan Transit Authority of Harris County, serving the Greater Houston, Texas region with safe, clean, reliable, accessible and friendly public transportation services.

The official METRO Q Ticketing app allows you to purchase:

‚Ä¢ Single ride tickets for local bus and rail
‚Ä¢ METRO day pass for local bus and rail
‚Ä¢ Park & Ride tickets (full fare only)

You can make purchases with a credit card, PayPal, Apple Pay or Google Pay. Tickets are then available for immediate activation and use.


COMMON QUESTIONS:

Q: Do I need to be connected to the internet?
A: Ticket purchases require a cellular network or wireless connection. However, you can activate and use tickets offline.

Q: How quickly are ticket purchases processed? 
A: Once the payment is authorized, your purchase is processed immediately and your ticket is then available for immediate activation.

Q: Can I purchase multiple fares at the same time? 
A: You can purchase and activate multiple tickets for multiple passengers. Up to 30 tickets may be purchased at one time. You can purchase up to $50 in tickets per day.

Q: How long are tickets valid?
A: Individual bus or rail tickets can be saved and used for up to 2 years from the original purchase date.

Q: How can I plan a trip?
A:  The METRO Q Ticketing app contains a link to our METRO TRIP app which provides routes, schedules and real-time arrival information so you can quickly and easily plan your trip.

Q: What if my battery dies?
A: You must be able to show an activated ticket to either a bus operator (prior to boarding a bus) or a fare inspector (prior to boarding METRORail).


Additional questions and answers are accessible from the app.


Compatibility:

‚Ä¢  Android phones running an OS of 5.0 and above. Up to 2 versions behind will be supported.


For assistance, please contact METRO Customer Service at 713-635-4000 or visit the website at RideMETRO.org

comments: I've used this app without incident for five years until today. The one day I don't have cash on hand it decides to randomly log me out and wont let me sign back in, even after updating my password. Thankfully I ran into another passenger I know, or I'd be stranded with two more buses to catch and no way home. Awful.

This app is garbage. It loses your tickets for no reason and then you call customer service to try to fix it but nothing gets done. I was told that I didn't even have an account with them but I've been using it since the first app. If this happened to you then don't even bother because customer service won't help at all

I've had this app for a year everything has been working ok now I'm being logged out have been trying to log back in and my email is not being accepted I have reset my password but when I try to log in my email is not being accepted can this issue please be fixed
Needs to be able to change password faster instead of having to call someone if you forget your password.
Shouldn't have to reconnect to internet just to use tickets you already bought and paid for after only a few days.

title: WinIt - Fight Your Tickets

With a risk-free guarantee for parking tickets, and high success rates in disputing traffic tickets, WinIt is the best way to manage and fight your parking and traffic tickets.

We've contracted with seasoned parking specialists and traffic attorneys who have been fighting tickets for over 20 years to provide you with a best-of-breed solution to easily and cost-effectively fight your parking and traffic tickets!

‚Ä¢ Upload all your tickets
‚Ä¢ Check the status of your disputes at any time
‚Ä¢ Keep an eye out for new violations with our ticket guardian and auto-dispute feature

Parking ticket disputes are risk-free: WinIt only charges 50% of the ticket amount, and only when your ticket is dismissed!

Before you pay your traffic ticket, get a quote from an experienced traffic attorney for the cost to fight it!

If you have any questions, problems, or feedback, don‚Äôt hesitate to send us an email at support@appwinit.com

comments: After I heard from all my friends about this amazing app. I did download it and submit my first ticket. that was great!! Win the first time . I did not have to submit any information or any documents. I just uploaded the ticket with a short explanation. Took few weeks but I received every week an update about the status of my ticket than final notice was dismissed and waved. It's always worth to try !!

At first I was skeptical about this app on how the service helps fights your parking ticket but figured I'd give it a try. My parking ticket was unjust but I didn't want to waste my time fighting this legal battle, so I thought I'd give this a try. It actually works but the process took about 2 months cause of scheduling and hearing. I would recommend giving this app a try, who knows, it might help. Doesn't hurt to try.

I love this app, very very easy to use, it detects your tickets automatically and you can choose to fight it or not, let's be honest obviously you'll want to fight it because when you fight it with "Winit" you will actually "Winit" I just won a parking ticket that I got! Thanks Winit!
Amazing app and great work, they actually got my parking ticket dismissed! It's a win-win, if they couldn't have done it, I would have paid it anyway, instead I paid their fee and saved $22.50!

They fought a few parking tickets which is nice but what's most impressive is that they dismissed a moving violation which would've incurred points and a fine - they got it dismissed completely! Great communication throughout!

title: MTA eTix
description:
The MTA eTix app allows customers on MNR‚Äôs Hudson, Harlem and New Haven lines and all LIRR branches to purchase tickets on their phones.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Never use a vending machine or wait in line again when purchasing your rail ticket for Metro-North Railroad or Long Island Rail Road. Your phone is the ticket machine. Better yet, your phone is the ticket.

With MTA eTix, you can securely purchase One Way, Round Trip, CityTicket, Weekly and Monthly tickets in seconds. Purchasing a ticket is easy: sign up for an account, select your trip, buy your ticket and enter your card information, then activate your ticket just before you board.

Benefits
‚Ä¢ Never worry about missing a train while you're stuck in line to buy your ticket
‚Ä¢ See all your tickets in your electronic wallet 
‚Ä¢ 'Punch' your own ticket just before you board
‚Ä¢ Never misplace your ticket again
‚Ä¢ Take your ticket with you when you upgrade your phone

If you are having issues using the app, please call customer services at 511 for support and ask to speak to a Representative after selecting your railroad. Customers outside NY State call 877 690 5114.

comments: Locking to a single device is incredibly STUPID! Three years later, this still isn't fixed! Should be tied to ACCOUNT not DEVICE! There are many reasons a person in 2020 would have more than one device. Should at the very minimum allow for TWO devices. Even BANKS let you add as many devices as you want! Seriously faulty. I've had to make three accounts because whenever I log into an existing account, it tells me it's gonna log me out after logging in a certain amount of times. title: My Ticket
description:
‚ÄúMy Ticket‚Äù ‚Äì a revolutionary way to distribute BWW function tickets. BWW Global Launches the form of a electronic ticketing facility, which shall be an end to end ticketing module available through your Smartphone & Web portal.

1) Seamlessly works across platforms viz. Android as well as iOS. At the same time this module works well with feature phones apart from Smartphones.

2) Leaders have the liberty to buy tickets upfront or pick tickets on credit just as they are doing currently.

3) Just as the leaders distribute tickets to their down lines, My Ticket follows the same pattern of working but electronically.

4) At the click of the button, tickets shall be made available across the country simultaneously. Hence zero transit time through courier.

5) Tracking all your ticket transactions just got easy‚Ä¶click & get it on your Smartphone.

6) The electronic ticket serves the dual purpose of KYC (Know Your Customer) norm as well which is a statutory requirement.

title: eTickets
description:
eTickets is the ultimate app for anyone to find great deals on tickets for Sports, Music or Theater events. We have a live seat map which you can review before making your bookings. Get notified of your favorite artists when they are performing around you. 

FEATURES

‚Ä¢ Search Performer: Like a performer or a performance, add it to your favorite and we will notify you when the event happens next. 
‚Ä¢ Notifications: Get all the alerts and notifications of your favorite performers upcoming events, concerts, sports and theaters.
‚Ä¢ Mobile Tickets: Book tickets through the application and your phone becomes your ticket! 
‚Ä¢ Interactive Maps: Filter listing of your chosen ticket by seat arrangement section and get details about it.
‚Ä¢ Newsletter: Subscribe to the newsletter and get all the updates in your email.
‚Ä¢ Sharing Events/Performers: Share the link of the various performers and performances with your friends via social apps.
‚Ä¢ Concert Info: Get up-to-date concert information nearby you.
‚Ä¢ Similar performer: You will be having handy list of similar performers while you are on your the chosen performer.

title: CharmPass
description:
The CharmPass app lets you purchase and use fares instantly on your phone‚Äîanywhere, anytime. Just download the free app, register your debit/credit card or PayPal account in our secure system, and you're ready to go.
 
WHY YOU'LL LOVE THIS APP:
‚Ä¢ No paper fares to track.
‚Ä¢ Purchase BaltimoreLink Local Service, MARC Train, and Commuter Bus tickets all from one app. 
‚Ä¢ No need to carry cash, count exact change, or find a ticket machine.
‚Ä¢ Buy and use fares instantly using a debit/credit card or your PayPal account.
‚Ä¢ Pay a single fare or multiple fares for a group of riders.
 
HOW IT WORKS:
1. CHOOSE SERVICE 
2. CHOOSE FARE
3. SELECT TICKET TYPE
4. CHOOSE QUANTITY
5. CHECK OUT
 
COMMON QUESTIONS:
Q: Do I need to be connected to the Internet?
A: Cellular network or a wireless Internet connection is required to purchase tickets, but you can activate your pre-purchased tickets offline.

Q: What if my battery dies?
A: Just like with paper tickets, you're responsible for making sure you have a valid fare at all times, so be sure to plan ahead!

IMPORTANT REMINDERS:
‚Ä¢ Don't uninstall the CharmPass app or erase your phone while you have active tickets on it. Your tickets are stored on your phone (which makes it possible to use them without a cellular network or a wireless Internet connection), so uninstalling the app can permanently erase your tickets!
‚Ä¢ Purchase your ticket anytime and activate your fare as you‚Äôre boarding.
‚Ä¢ Show your ticket to the operator of the vehicle.
‚Ä¢ Watch your battery level! Just like with paper tickets, you're responsible for making sure you have a valid fare at all times.

comments: This app is absolutely fantastic. Kudos to the developers who thought of every detail needed for this app. Fingerprint authentication, easy to use interface, tickets are saved offline. Just to name a few. I use this 3 times a week commuting from Baltimore to DC and love it. Save time and paper!

Wonderfully easy to navigate & use. After you buy your first tickets, each subsequent time you open the app, it opens to the "Buy Tickets" page and the "Buy Again" feature, which is almost always why you you need to go there in the first place. Very handy. Also very easy to check your account settings and history.

Makes everything easy and convenient. I like that the monthly pass goes by number of days and not an actual month. If I buy it on the 26th, it's good for 31 days as opposed to the month of September. Saves me money!

So the app has improved and I love the fact that you can buy the pass with your debit card and I like how the monthly pass last longer when purchase on a later date. It is very useful to me! Keep up the good work!üëçüèºüëçüèΩüòÅ

title: INWEGO - Tickets to Sports, Concerts, and Events
description:
INWEGO is a monthly event membership that gets you tickets to events in your city. Choose from hundreds of pro/college sports, concerts, and local events. Your tickets are included in your membership and are all available on your phone in the INWEGO app. 

It's free to download the app & check out upcoming events in your city!

--AVAILABLE CITIES--
Atlanta
Dallas/Fort Worth
Denver
Phoenix
Tampa/St. Pete
Washington DC
...More cities coming soon!

--HOW DOES INWEGO WORK?--
1. JOIN & EXPLORE. Become a member and start discovering hundreds of pro/college sports, concerts, festivals, and other events in your city. 
2. GET TICKETS. Find an event you love, and reserve a ticket in the app. No wallet required! All tickets are included with your membership. 
3. SIT WITH FRIENDS. Link your ticket with other INWEGO friends to sit together, or buy a guest ticket for non-members. 
4. EASY CHECK-IN. Check-in on your app when you arrive to the event and get your ticket instantly. Everything you need is on your phone!


--BENEFITS--
1. ALL-INCLUDED. Your tickets are included with your membership. No additional costs or service fees. 
2. ONE STOP SHOP. Find hundreds of sports, concerts, festivals and other things to do in one place. 
3. SOCIALIZE. Link and sit with INWEGO friends, or buy guest tickets for non-members. 
4. EASY TO USE. No more ticket windows or looking through emails. All of your tickets are in the app!
5. PERKS. Earn more with our GoRewards and Referral programs.
6. FLEXIBILITY. Easily reserve and cancel tickets. You can also change, pause, or cancel your membership anytime.

title: LoMag Ticket scanner - Control tickets - Guestlist
description:
It's simple and secure application for event organizers to control tickets on the venue entry. Ticket scanner allows you to use your phone to scan tickets and verify codes. The program can use the phone's camera or use hardware-based code readers (eg in data collectors). Simply send barcodes from Excel or a text file and you can verify your guest tickets for your event.
Usage:
- Upload list of barcodes for your event from Excel / XML or Text file 
- Add extra attendees codes manually or scan extra codes from tickets.
- Manage multiple events simultaneously using many files
- Scan 1D and 2D barcodes, including QR codes and check if code from ticket is on the list
- analyze statistics, send results to email / file / cloud
Application settings:
- data format: XLS, XLSX, CSV, Json, XML
- text file format: SCII, Unicode
- block duplicate scans
- timeout for next scan
- vibration/sound after scan
- type of supported codes: QR CODE, DATAMATRIX, UPC, EAN8, EAN 13, CODE 128, CODE 93, CODE 39, ITP, PDF417

title: BarcodeChecker for Tickets
description:
BarcodeChecker is an app to scan and check event tickets with barcodes or QR codes. It allows event organizers to verify barcode tickets at the entrance with one or multiple Android smartphones and log attendance.

You cannot use the app to scan lottery tickets or purchased tickets if you are not the event organizer and have a list of valid barcodes.

Each valid ticket is admitted only once; forged or copied tickets are rejected. After scanning a valid barcode the smartphone flashes green and beeps 1x, but after scanning an invalid barcode it flashes red, vibrates and beeps 3x.

You can check barcode tickets that were printed with the TicketCreator software or import any other list of barcodes or QR codes from an Excel file. For registered tickets the name of the ticket holder or additional info can be displayed after the scan.

During scanning, the smartphones must be connected to a Windows PC, which runs the BarcodeChecker software as server and contains the list of valid barcodes.


NOTE:
The app is free, however, you must purchase and install the BarcodeChecker for Windows software to run the server on your PC. You can test the server for free in trial mode.


FEATURES:
‚Ä¢	Scan ticket with barcodes or QR codes
‚Ä¢	Check tickets that were printed with the TicketCreator software
‚Ä¢	Import and check any list of barcodes or QR codes from an Excel file
‚Ä¢	Scan with multiple smartphones
‚Ä¢	Display name of ticketholder for registered tickets (reception/welcome function)
‚Ä¢	Record time of arrival and departure
‚Ä¢	Export attendance list
‚Ä¢	Restrict access to certain sections
‚Ä¢	Supports Bluetooth barcode scanners
‚Ä¢	Damaged barcodes can be entered manually
‚Ä¢	Requires Windows PC as server


SETUP:
1.) Download BarcodeChecker app to smartphone.
2.) Install BarcodeChecker software for Windows on PC. The software must be purchased or can be tested in trial mode for free.
3.) Start BarcodeChecker software on PC as server and open list of valid barcodes.
4.) Connect smartphones by WIFI to BarcodeChecker server PC.
5.) Scan tickets with smartphones.

Supported barcode formats:
‚Ä¢	QR codes
‚Ä¢	Code 39, Code 128, 
‚Ä¢	UPC-A/E, EAN-8/13
‚Ä¢	PDF 417
‚Ä¢	Code 2 of 5 interleaved
‚Ä¢	Data Matrix
‚Ä¢	Aztec

MORE INFORMATION:
https://www.TicketCreator.com/barcodechecker_app.htm

Each valid ticket is admitted only once; forged or copied tickets are rejected. After scanning a valid barcode the smartphone flashes green and beeps 1x, but after scanning an invalid barcode it flashes red, vibrates and beeps 3x.

You can check barcode tickets that were printed with the TicketCreator software or import any other list of barcodes or QR codes from an Excel file. For registered tickets the name of the ticket holder or additional info can be displayed after the scan.

During scanning, the smartphones must be connected to a Windows PC, which runs the BarcodeChecker software as server and contains the list of valid barcodes.


NOTE:
The app is free, however, you must purchase and install the BarcodeChecker for Windows software to run the server on your PC. You can test the server for free in trial mode.


FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ Scan ticket with barcodes or QR codes
‚Ä¢ Check tickets that were printed with the TicketCreator software
‚Ä¢ Import and check any list of barcodes or QR codes from an Excel file
‚Ä¢ Scan with multiple smartphones
‚Ä¢ Display name of ticketholder for registered tickets (reception/welcome function)
‚Ä¢ Record time of arrival and departure
‚Ä¢ Export attendance list
‚Ä¢ Restrict access to certain sections
‚Ä¢ Supports Bluetooth barcode scanners
‚Ä¢ Damaged barcodes can be entered manually
‚Ä¢ Requires Windows PC as server


SETUP:
1.) Download BarcodeChecker app to smartphone.
2.) Install BarcodeChecker software for Windows on PC. The software must be purchased or can be tested in trial mode for free.
3.) Start BarcodeChecker software on PC as server and open list of valid barcodes.
4.) Connect smartphones by WIFI to BarcodeChecker server PC.
5.) Scan tickets with smartphones.

Supported barcode formats:
‚Ä¢ QR codes
‚Ä¢ Code 39, Code 128,
‚Ä¢ UPC-A/E, EAN-8/13
‚Ä¢ PDF 417
‚Ä¢ Code 2 of 5 interleaved
‚Ä¢ Data Matrix
‚Ä¢ Aztec

MORE INFORMATION:
https://www.TicketCreator.com/barcodechecker_app.htm
summary: Scan and check tickets with barcodes or QR codes.
