title: Ticket Printer
description:
BR Ticket Printer is a mobile ticketing machine app allowing drivers or conductors to print tickets on a bus.

Any Android phone paired with a Bluetooth printer can become a full-featured bus ticket machine. A bus fleet with the app onboard can be remotely configured, managed, and tracked on our Ticket Admin web site at www.brdata.in. The Ticket Printer app can also work on a standalone Android device without Internet or a SIM card.

Features
 ‚Ä¢ Works with a wide variety of Bluetooth thermal and dot-matrix printers
 ‚Ä¢ Real-time/daily/weekly/monthly ticket sales reports
 ‚Ä¢ GPS location tracking of buses
 ‚Ä¢ View count of passengers on-board and getting off at each stop
 ‚Ä¢ Configure routes with predefined stops/stages and fares
 ‚Ä¢ Automatically change stops using GPS based Geofencing
 ‚Ä¢ Calculate reverse trip and fares automatically
 ‚Ä¢ Maintain thousands of destinations, fares, and routes online
 ‚Ä¢ Divide and group routes based on location, destination, depot, etc.
 ‚Ä¢ Discounted fares for children
 ‚Ä¢ Support for concession/monthly passes and luggage tickets
 ‚Ä¢ Stage lock feature to prevent issuing of tickets for older stages
 ‚Ä¢ Secure settings with administrator PIN
 ‚Ä¢ User-configurable expenses - Tolls, Driver wage, Fuel, etc.
 ‚Ä¢ Capture notes such as Driver/Conductor Name
 ‚Ä¢ Print trip and daily sales reports
 ‚Ä¢ Print check report with a breakup of passengers currently on board
 ‚Ä¢ Customisable headers and footers
 ‚Ä¢ Support for paper cutter escape code in the footer
 ‚Ä¢ Automatic locale-based date and number formats
 ‚Ä¢ Contact the developer for customization and language support

The tiket.com app makes it easy to book tickets and hotels online. Get  low-cost airline tickets, hotels, train tickets, car rentals and entertainment at your fingertips at tiket.com! Thousands of tickets and hotels await you, anywhere and anytime.

WHY INSTALL THE TIKET.COM APP?

BEST DEALS EVERY DAY

Thousands of hotels and tickets at your fingertips! Check out airline and train ticket deals, affordable hotel bookings and car rentals, and tickets to your favorite attractions and concert. At tiket.com, there are lots of great deals to make your vacation budget go even further! 

SIMPLE AND EASY BOOKING!

As simple as tiket.com! Anytime and anywhere you want to book tickets and hotels, we‚Äôre always here for you at tiket.com. Quick and easy booking!

Just find the tickets or hotel you‚Äôre looking for, pay, and your e-tickets will be on the way to your email. It‚Äôs that simple to book flight tickets and hotels at tiket.com!

MORE WAYS TO PAY

tiket.com is your loyal partner and makes your vacation even easier. There are lots of ways to pay at tiket.com. Pay for airline tickets, hotels, train tickets, car rentals, even entertainment the way you want to.

Pay by ATM transfer, bank transfer, online debit, credit card, virtual account or at the convenience store. What about our  0% installment scheme? You choose. Sound good? It‚Äôs  as simple as tiket.com!

ONLINE CHECK-IN NOW AVAILABLE!

tiket.com has a host of exciting features to make your trip or vacation easier. Try the online check-in feature at tiket.com! If you‚Äôve booked your flights, check-in quickly and easily using the online check-in feature on the tiket.com app. And the Upcoming Flights feature will remind you about online check-in and departure times! tiket.com really is your loyal holiday partner.

TIX MEMBERSHIP

Become a tiket.com member to make booking even easier. TIX Members get TIX Points with every purchase at tiket.com. And as a tiket.com member, you‚Äôll get amazing discounts and gifts too!

ANY QUESTIONS? WE‚ÄôRE HERE FOR YOU

Got a question? We‚Äôre always here for you. Need anything? You can count on us.

Hit us up anytime on WhatsApp 0855 1500 878, and our 24/7 customer care will get right back to you!

Install the tiket.com app now!

comments: The complicated account listing process must have a last name. How about people who only have one word in their name. The password is also rejected continuously. Strange application in my opinion.
Experience , UI , UX , is satisfying . I'm happy to use this simple app.

I had good experiances from the first I use this apps. But since yesterday I can not do the payment for my ticket booking. Tried to contact CS by wa chat.. but the respon was very slow. Dunno what to do till now
I would give at least 4 stars if: - we can determine the amount of tix point we want to use on a transaction - there is an expire list of the accumulated tix points

Request to reschedule was not informed until hours after my flight has flown; and the late e-mail of the newly issued one only gives 1 hour payment window. There was not even a confirmation whether my flight could be rescheduled or not until my original flight schedule has passed, so how long should a customer expect the e-mail you told us to check frequently for?

title: Wanderu
description:
Search, compare and book buses, trains and flights across North America and Europe.

Wanderu searches hundreds of ground travel and flight options to find you the best travel deals. Search bus, train and plane routes in the United States, Canada, Mexico, United Kingdom, Germany, France, Spain, Belgium, The Netherlands, Iceland, Ireland, Poland, Austria, Switzerland, Italy, Czech Republic, Slovakia, Croatia, Serbia, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Romania, Greece and many more.

‚Ä¢ Best New App - Google Play
‚Ä¢ Favorite New App - TIME
‚Ä¢ Best Travel App of 2019 - PC Magazine
‚Ä¢ Best Travel App to Use in 2019 - Newsweek

Score awesome deals on tickets from Wanderu‚Äôs official partners, including Amtrak and Deutsche Bahn trains, Greyhound buses, Megabus, Boltbus, Peter Pan Bus Lines, Adirondack Trailways of New York, Turimex Grupo Senda, Red Coach and many more in North America. European Partners include Flixbus, OUIBus, National Express and others. Wanderu offers the widest selection of trips available - online or in-app! Find bus tickets as low as $1 and hit the road.

NEW: Find and book flights to thousands of destinations across North America, Europe and beyond. Search flights right alongside bus and train routes to discover the travel option that fits your needs and budget in the best possible way. Flights on Wanderu are currently in BETA mode as we continue to expand our trip inventory and further enhance the user experience.

What the media has to say about Wanderu:
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúWanderu is easy to use.‚Äù - The New York Times
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúMakes finding and booking cheap tickets for buses and trains super simple.‚Äù - Lifehacker
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúIt helps travelers find the best ticket prices, at the most convenient times.‚Äù - TIME
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúProviding a more enjoyable and cheaper form of travel.‚Äù - Elite Daily
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúIt can be frustrating to switch from site to site looking for a cheap, convenient option. Wanderu solves that problem.‚Äù - The Economist
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúWanderu makes it much easier to book bus trips‚Äù - Mashable

FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ Easily FIND, COMPARE and BOOK bus, train and plane tickets.
‚Ä¢ No booking fees and always the lowest prices.
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúMy Trips‚Äù section to keep all of your reservations in one place.
‚Ä¢ View your past searches and save your favorite frequently searched trips for quick reference in the search history.
‚Ä¢ Mobile boarding available for some carriers - just show your app to board!
‚Ä¢ Choose your options based on the amenities and extras that matter to you - free WiFi, extra leg room, in-seat power outlets and more.
‚Ä¢ Wanderu combines, in real time, itineraries from multiple bus and train lines to create a unique journey, not available anywhere else!
‚Ä¢ Find the best walking or driving directions to or from the station/airport to your final destination.

COME WANDER WITH US:
‚Ä¢ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GoWanderu
‚Ä¢ Instagram: http://instagram.com/wanderu
‚Ä¢ Twitter: https://twitter.com/GoWanderu
‚Ä¢ Pinterest: http://www.pinterest.com/Wanderu/
‚Ä¢ Flipboard: https://flipboard.com/@Wanderu

Skip the lines and enjoy the ride. Wanderu is the simplest way to book buses, trains and flights!

recentChanges:
v2.3.1
- Improved the trip selection screen
- Added Google Pay Transit Passes for Go Buses in the My Trips section. This will allow you to save your ticket to the Google Pay app, receive trip reminders and board the bus using the Google Pay app.
- Misc. UI bug fixes and stability improvements

v2.3.0

comments: This app is awesome! Was able to get a greyhound ticket that departed that same day & was sold out on greyhounds website. Not only that, but it was also for less than half the price too! I hope one day it will expand to include even more modes of travel & companies. Oh by the way, I actually found wanderu through their website, not the app, & for some reason I could not purchase the ticket through the browser on my PC or my phone browser but it worked in the App I don't know why....
worked flawlessly for booking an urgent ticket- would reccomended this app over the Amtrak App, Greyhound App and others. Extremely useful! Thanks, developers
Very smooth interface. Provided a variety of options and quick booking response.
Was easily able to find my tickets for a cheap price. Made it very simple to compare and sort the tickets from different carriers.
Very easy to use, would definitely use this app all the time for bus and train bookings.

title: Ticket Spicket
description:
Ticket Spicket is the simple and convenient way to attend the high school sports and athletic events happening in your area. Join the growing community of sports fans on Ticket Spicket and help make your next event a big one, without a lot of extra effort.

Ticket Spicket is about more than just tickets! Use the mobile app to:

- Search for your game.
Discover the big match-ups and sports rivalries happening at local schools in your area by using our new powerful search capability.

- Show some love.
Follow schools and teams to highlight their events and easily navigate to their upcoming athletics schedule.

- Find the perfect pass.
Choose from a school‚Äôs entire list of custom-defined sports passes and season ticket bundles to select the perfect option for you.

- Make it easy.
Check-in with digital tickets and passes at the game while avoiding lines and without having to handle any cash.

- Reap the benefits.
Earn rewards for being a fan! By checking in at the event with Ticket Spicket, you‚Äôll receive exclusive in-app deals, discounts, and other offers from restaurants and businesses that sponsor your school and teams.

title: Bandsintown Concerts
description:
The highest rated and #1 downloaded concert discovery app for Android!
Never miss another live show.

Consider Bandsintown your go-to concert buddy. Our free app simplifies concert discovery by allowing you to track your favorite artists, be the first to receive tour alerts, and buy tickets - all in one place. Sync Bandsintown with your music apps to automatically connect with your favorite musicians, discover new music and get concert recommendations based on the music you‚Äôre already obsessed with. Join over 55 million fans who use Bandsintown to ensure they never miss the live music they love.

‚Ä¢ Get tickets to the hottest shows in your area
‚Ä¢ Sync your music libraries through apps like Spotify, Apple Music & Facebook to automatically track your favorites from over 530,000 artists

comments: I rely on this app to keep all my live shows in order, and I won't complain because it's free, but it has several annoying bugs. Too often shows from my RSVP list disappear without warning. Also shows I click Interested or Going for don't always appear in my calendar even though I have them set up to. I've had to clear the cache to get things back in working order several times.

App is OK. The event share link is for email (should provide options or allow a default option) - you have to do a search to find out that one can share OTHER than using email - which is a STUPID design choice for a mobile app (extra clicks!?). Secondly, when the Google maps link is selected it directs Maps to start in "directions" mode. It should open Maps to the location. One can easily select "directions" from the location. One CAN'T do is easily get the business name and address to share!

The Layout is confusing at times. Especially when you want to get to the band's you followed which should be something obvious and not as hidden as it is. It's a app you don't stare at hours of the day so it should be easy to learn and relearn. Other than that, top notch information about the tour plans of my bands.

Good app. Though maximum radius is not enogh. I can't even monitor towns 4 hours drive away. Another option would be to monitor several towns at the same time... which is also impossible. So I've ended up to switch some locations around, once in a while...which equals to 3 stars experience.

I only downloaded this app to purchase tickets to a specific show. I don't want to give access to my location, nor do I need the app to tell me what's available in my area. It would not let me proceed to purchase my tickets without allowing access to my location.

title: Cheap flights and airline tickets ‚Äî Jetradar
description:
Cheap airline tickets at your fingertips. The Jetradar app compares airfare deals from hundreds of airlines and travel agencies, sending great deals on airline tickets directly to your smartphone, tablet, or another mobile device. Flight booking made easy. Download the Jetradar app today to start your flight search! 

Top Trending App and TOP Developer awards by Google Play.

---Features:---

Jetradar gives you access to these incredible features, delivering the cheap airline tickets you deserve:

‚Ä¢ Comprehensive Search Engine: Jetradar compares airfare deals from 1,038 regular, charter, and low-cost airlines. Compare flight ticket prices from hundreds of travel agencies and booking systems, too. Great deals on air tickets and flights await.

‚Ä¢ Explore options with Price map:  A convenient price map displays cheap plane tickets across several destinations. Pick a place, book flights with peace of mind, and save. Low-cost airlines can take you places you‚Äôve always wanted to see!

‚Ä¢ Price calendar with cheapest flights: Are you flexible? Fly a few days before or after your chosen date and save up to 70% on your airline tickets price! Air tickets prices can vary depending on the day or week. Book flights knowing you‚Äôre getting the best deal. Airline tickets booking is finally easy.
 
‚Ä¢ Personal profile: Browse your flight searching, favorite flights, alerts, passenger info ‚Äî everything is synchronized across all devices in your personal profile. Cheap plane tickets aren't all we‚Äôre here for; we want you to have a personalized experience!

Discovering cheap airfares and deals on low-cost airlines is not enough? Jetradar offers a number of valuable additional features to deliver the best airline tickets booking experience:

Favorites: Find cheap airfares but think they might get cheaper? Add airfare search results to your "Favorites" list ‚Äî track planet ticket price changes instantly! Jetradar sends automatic notifications about airfare changes, giving you the chance to book airline tickets at the cheapest prices, every time.

History: A comprehensive archive organizes all your previous flight searching. With a tap of your finger, view every air ticket deal you've scored and every plane ticket you've ever purchased. Airfare search history provides a detailed account of cheap airfares across low-cost airlines.

Flight statistics: Check baggage allowance, delay information, aircraft models, and even who‚Äôs running your flight. Who knew plane tickets could come with so much? We do more than providing deals on flight tickets, we give you the juicy details.

Flexible Filtering Options: Search for cheap airline tickets however you want, whenever you want. Narrow flight searches by a number of stops, total price, journey time, stopover duration, and more. Jetradar even provides recommendations for cheap flights based on your preferences! Flight tickets booking made easy.

Sharing: Easily share cheap plane tickets via several messaging services.  Great air tickets and flights for the perfect journey with friends or family. You don‚Äôt have to be the only one with awesome airplane tickets!

Jetradar is designed to make flight booking easy, helping you compare cheap flights with convenience. Find unbeatable deals on airline tickets from American Airlines and Allegiant Airlines. Whether you're looking for domestic flights, international flights, or last minute deals on flight tickets ‚Äî it doesn't matter. Jetradar empowers you by delivering all the cheap airline tickets available, and other helpful options you need when trying to book flights with great airfare deals. Get the best air tickets price, every time.

*NOTE: The Jetradar app helps you find cheap flights from A to B. We don‚Äôt sell airplane tickets. We look for the best airfares available and lead you to airline and agency websites to book airline tickets. We‚Äôd love to hear more about your flight search and flight booking experience!

title: The Ticket Clinic - A Law Firm
description:
We‚Äôve taken over 30 years of traffic ticket fighting experience and combined it with a newly redesigned app experience to make the fastest, easiest way to dispute a traffic ticket ever.


Need help with any type of traffic ticket? Fast, reliable and professional assistance to fight your speeding ticket, suspended license or any other type of violation is just a few taps away. The Ticket Clinic has resolved 5,000,000 cases nationwide and counting. Let us help with your case via our convenient and powerful traffic ticket fighting app! Download now and get started in just a few minutes.


=== How it works ===

1)            Scan your license or enter contact info

2)            Answer a few questions about your ticket

3)            Get Quote / Submit Payment

4)            Standby for notifications such as your dismissal notice


In non-criminal, civil cases our attorneys will go to court for you. Also we have a full staff of legal assistants if you have any questions. Just tap the call now button in the app.


The Ticket Clinic Difference


We Are A Law Firm


Many of our competitors are not real law firms! They are tech startups with no legal experience or attorneys on staff. It says so right in their disclaimer. Any matter that could affect your license even a simple speeding ticket needs to be taken seriously. Who are you going to trust?


Our Track Record


We‚Äôre one of the first law firms ever to focus solely on traffic offenses. In our home state of FL, we have a 98% success rate. Our firm has been on the driver‚Äôs side since 1987 and shows no sign of slowing down.


Support By Humans


Technology is great but we understand that when it comes to sensitive matters that could impact someone‚Äôs driving privileges, you might want to speak to a real person. For this reason we have a support staff taking calls Monday - Friday: 8:00am - 10:00pm Saturday - Sunday: 8:00am - 8:00pm. Just tap the call button in the app to speak with a real human during our business hours.


Money Back Guarantee (Florida)


In Florida, The Ticket Clinic offers you a 100% money back guarantee. NO POINTS, NO SCHOOL, NO COURT! This is on non-criminal, civil infractions only, some restrictions apply ‚Äì since every case if different, please inquire for details.


Why Should You Download Our App?


1)            Utilize convenient features such as the license scanner, notifications and unlock phone-only promotions

2)            Instantly check the details and status of your case quickly without a computer

3)            Hire our experience traffic ticket attorneys without having to spend time on the phone

4)            More traffic ticket fighting features coming soon

As a globetrotter, I can't live without this app. It's efficient, on point, and best of all, the price you see is the price you pay. Good job guys, well done
This application is the best application if you want to book online flight tickets at cheap rates and its very easy to book through this application ,everone can use this application.
Cheap flight ticket book is very nice application. It's have best and useful features. I ever booking from this application. I like this app.

title: Greyhound Lines
description:
With the Greyhound app, everything about your trip is at your fingertips. It is your personal ticket kiosk ‚Äì in the palm of your hand.

‚Ä¢	All access homepage - Access upcoming trips, book a new trip, find travel inspiration, station location information, and track your bus directly from the home screen. 
‚Ä¢	E-Tickets - The future of bus travel is here! We're making bus travel faster and easier than ever before by offering E-Tickets. Now when you buy your bus ticket from the mobile app or on greyhound.com you can choose to have a paperless E-Ticket delivered right to your smartphone ‚Äì no waiting in lines, no waiting for an email ticket. Spend less time at the bus station and more time enjoying your trip!
‚Ä¢	Check-In - Check-In for any trip that is E-Ticket eligible from the Home screen or Trip details. Check-In begins two hours prior to your scheduled departure time. We‚Äôll send you a message on your Home screen to remind you it‚Äôs time to check-in. 
‚Ä¢	Personalized updates - With our new design, you will get everything you need for your day of travel on the app home screen. Personalized messages will let you know when it‚Äôs time to check-in for your trip, count down until it‚Äôs time to depart, and even allow you to access your E-Ticket.
‚Ä¢	Road Rewards Members - Sign-in to your Road Rewards account, and you‚Äôll have easy access to all your trips and tickets in one new convenient place called Trips. You‚Äôll see all of your upcoming trips and have access to your travel details. If you are not a Road Rewards member, sign up now. It's free!
‚Ä¢	Trip details - You‚Äôll see all your upcoming trip details and get notifications on when you can check-in for your E-Ticket. You can also easily find station location information and contact details, driving directions, or track your bus.

For details on what personal information we collect and for what purpose, your privacy rights and how to exercise them, visit www.greyhound.com/legal/privacy-policy/

comments: App is fine but could be better. I like how I can quickly book trips and skip going to counter. It remembers what I did previously which is nice. Negatives for me would be bus tracker does not work when looking at individual ticket but when you go to main bus tracker part of app you can put in your bus number. The other bigger negative is when looking at your trips there doesn't seem to be any order into the way they are displayed. I have to look through a random list to find my ticket.

Needs to have more ways to pay for the ticket instead of the usual way of going to the website which takes more data to load up the page. Vs the app having the pay pal option or just cash payment option. And being able to see the reservation in the app and store it in Mobile wallet in case you get locked out of your email account.

The worst travel experience you'll ever have starts with this app. Ticket selection sucks. It will automatically change your selection to a different boarding station without letting you know... causing confusion and mistakes. Then the "track bus" will fail to load, so you can't check whether the bus is late or if you're in the wrong station... More confusion... Finally, schedule numbers, confirmation numbers, and station addresses are all located on different menus... An amazingly awful app.

Signed in to a friend's account to pay for their ticket for it to change the passengers name to mine resulting in me having to pay to change the name back to theirs. That doesn't make sense. I shouldn't have to go back and change anything if it's already there to begin with. As soon as I put in my card info, I guess it changes the passengers name????? WHY? That's the whole point of me signing into their account, so all the info is already in place, so I can just put my card info in and be done.
The app is pretty easy to use. My advice, book single trip tickets instead of round trip. If your plans change you won't lose too much money.

title: SMART eTickets
description:
The Sonoma-Marin Area Rail Transit (SMART) eTickets app allows you to purchase and use tickets instantly on your phone using a debit or credit card. Simply download the free app, register your e-mail address in our secure system and you're ready to ride. 


With the SMART Train Mobile Tickets app, you can:

¬∑ Purchase one-way or round-trip tickets 
¬∑ Receive a discounted fare if you qualify as: Youth (5 -18), Senior (65 & Older) or 
  a passenger with disabilities 
¬∑ Pay a single fare or multiple fares for a group of riders
¬∑ Store multiple tickets on your phone for future use
¬∑ Activate tickets
¬∑ Register your debit/credit card in our secure system 


IMPORTANT REMINDERS:

¬∑ You need an account to use mobile tickets. An account only requires an email & 
  password
¬∑ Once you purchase your ticket it will appear in your "ticket wallet"
¬∑ Activate your ticket shortly before boarding the SMART Train
¬∑ If you purchased multiple tickets remember to activate all of them. Tickets are displayed 
  in order of activation. Swipe to advance to the next ticket
¬∑ Be prepared to show your active ticket(s) to SMART personnel
¬∑ Keep an eye on your battery level. You are held responsible for having a mobile phone in 
  good working order and usable prior to boarding. If your mobile phone is inoperable you 
  must use some other payment method for the journey
¬∑ Mobile tickets do not need cell phone or WiFi services to be activated. However, you do 
  need connectivity during the purchase of the ticket.
¬∑ Mobile tickets are valid for 90 minutes after activation
¬∑ Mobile tickets that have been purchased, but not activated, will expire after 30 days
¬∑ Transfer credits are not available via the SMART mobile ticket app
¬∑ If you lose or purchase a new device you can transfer any valid, unused tickets to a new 
  device. 



SMART POLICY ON REFUNDS:

¬∑ Generally, SMART does not issue refunds on mobile products
¬∑ In the case of extenuating circumstances, customers can submit a refund request
¬∑ Refund form can be found on: www.SonomaMarinTrain.org

recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Improvements to reliability, accessibility and performance throughout the app.
comments: App is ok, but you can't connect it with the Clipper Account and can't tap your phone to board. I have to carry my Clipper card to use the balance there. I always have my phone so it seems like they should work together.  Also, what's up with only accepting Apple Pay and MasterPay? How about Android or PayPal?  Seems like old tech for a "SMART" train.

I like the app very convenient I'd rate it higher but what I dislike is it does not give you the option to log in from a different device, I have a valid ticket with another phone that broke, so whats up with that???
app is okay. i do not understand the "security" protocol of not being able to log into multiple devices.

Do not trust the time table they give you! I missed 3 trains just by showing up a couple minutes before the departure. The train left early and left my dinglefarting around until the next train ditched me early.
Thank you for your help Stanley!

title: Event Tickets Plus
description:
Keep the line moving and your guests happy with Event Tickets Plus! Your attendees will love having the option of using either mobile or printed tickets, and the Event Tickets Plus App can handle both.

As you scan QR codes at the door, the event attendee list updates in real time on your site‚Äîthis app works with our Event Tickets Plus ticketing system and allows you to quickly scan attendee tickets and record that information on the admin side of your WordPress site. Combine it with The Events Calendar plugin for a full events management solution!

comments: I'm facing an issue with this app: tickets that have not already been checked in are almost immediately scanned a second time, and therefore the app displays that the user is already checked in. There is no 5 seconds delay in this case, unlike written in the description.
love the system, works well on my phone but the camera on my tablet does not want to focus when I'm in the app.. yet the camera works fine when I'm not using the app.
Really easy to connect this app to our website and working flawlessly to scan our attendees. Really fast.
Needs updates. feels abandoned
Awesome

title: PDF Ticket: PDF Viewer - Ticket Manager - Easy
description:
With this app you can manage all tickets you recieved in pdf form.
No matter if it is your bus ticket, moviecards or a voucher! 

No more searching the filesystem! Add it once and find it then immediately.
All tickets will be displayed inside the app so there is no need for an pdf-reader

Also you can favorite some tickets (like your bus ticket) so you can access them quicker.
If an ticket is not used anymore, but you don't wanna delete it, you can simply archive it.
Beside that there is also a normal delete function.

The app stores all files internally, so you can't delete an ticket accidentally. But it is recommended to keep an backup of all your files ;-)

If there is a problem please contact me!

Thanks:
Icon made by https://www.flaticon.com/authors/roundicons from www.flaticon.com

title: My Ticket New
description:
‚ÄúMy Ticket‚Äù ‚Äì a revolutionary way to distribute BWW function tickets. BWW Global Launches the form of a electronic ticketing facility, which shall be an end to end ticketing module available through your Smartphone & Web portal.

1) Seamlessly works across platforms viz. Android as well as iOS. At the same time this module works well with feature phones apart from Smartphones.

2) Leaders have the liberty to buy tickets upfront or pick tickets on credit just as they are doing currently.

3) Just as the leaders distribute tickets to their down lines, My Ticket follows the same pattern of working but electronically.

4) At the click of the button, tickets shall be made available across the country simultaneously. Hence zero transit time through courier.

5) Tracking all your ticket transactions just got easy‚Ä¶click & get it on your Smartphone.

6) The electronic ticket serves the dual purpose of KYC (Know Your Customer) norm as well which is a statutory requirement.

comments: Terrible. Chat never available. Cancel feature broken. Called multiple times to hear a recording that the service was not available. When I finally got through, the agent uttered I was being unresponsive and quickly hung up while I was talking. She literally gave me 1 second to reply while on hold for over 2 hours. Now I'm stranded outside the country in this crisis because the airline canceled a flight and put me on a connection before the first flight. I'm not a time traveler. Thanks Expedia!

This app sucks, how did it get 4.5 stars? You will NOT GET ANY REFUND if you cancel a flight. You will only get CREDITS can only be redeemed by calling them. You cannot use your credits on the app!!! And they have some technical issues so you cannot call them to book a flight. So your refund money is gone. The app sucks.

DO NOT BOOK TRAVEL WITH THIS APP!!! Due to covid19, we had flights booked. The airline canceled our flights but cannot refund us because we booked with Expedia. Expedia's robotic call system will not allow us to speak to an agent and there is STILL no option on the app for a refund. We are trapped in a foreign country as they have our money and we cannot book another flight. We are not the only ones. UPDATE: Your reply matches Expedia's Mar 12 email, but nothing has changed with ref to refunds.

I found the travel insurance that is offered to be useless in the face of a real emergency. I purchased my trip long before the COVID virus was announced. I am outraged that the travel insurance company was allowed to add a bunch of exclusions concerning COVID-19 long after my purchase. AIG altered the policy to avoid paying out. In my opinion, the insurance offered is a scam.

recentChanges: Thanks for choosing the Amtrak app. We continue to fix bugs and improve the experience. Please check for updates frequently to take advantage of the improvements.
comments: Patience helpful, but considering the complexity and enormity of content, it works. Train Status function very helpful, as most trains are reliably not on time. Can be clunky. Useful to browse routes, learn about connections, make reservations. Many, many rules apply; critical to understand before purchase. App details most of it.

Convenient but Glitchy. It is a must if traveling on Amtrak, but it will often display an outdated trip count for multi-ride passes, 1 out of 10 times ticket purchasing doesn't work, and some days the app will not let either of my two phones login to show the conductor my ticket. Always keep a paper copy on hand or a receipt with the QR code in your email as a backup. But even with those issues, I use it every day and it is great for tracking and using Amtrak on the go.
This app is almost useless unless you know where the train routes go. There's hundreds of stations that don't connect so you have to play a guessing game for hours to attempt to plan a trip.

Terrible. Glitchy. Round trip tickets do not show up. every time I want to use a multi-ride ticket, I have to search through my email, find the number, go back to the app, then search for the ticket. it's insane. Also it doesn't show how many points my account has. That's not really important, but the fact that the app doesn't update from whatever database they have just shows another flaw. Sometimes it crashes without reason, other times it won't let you buy tickets without any error codes.
You can check the train schedule, buy your tickets and use this app to board the train. Really convenient! No standing in line to buy tickets.
